column4: Hello people, today I update my ubuntu 12.04 to 12.10...and I can logging anymore....In recovery mode I can't select options...anyone can help me ?
My passwords is correct, but ubuntu say: invalid passwords
try in recovery mode boot from "ALT" cd/dvd/usb then passwd your user and you should be good to go
boot with a ubuntu cd correct ? what's is from ALT ?
